title.native: ONE PIECE 〜アドベンチャー オブ ネブランディア〜

description: The Davy Back Fight Arc competitors journey to New World with new crew members Dojaku, Kansho and tactical genius Komei for a meeting that will take place on a foggy island that makes devil fruit users unable to use to their abilities.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Cyborg
tags.description: Prominently features a human character whose physiological functions are aided or enhanced by artificial means.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/@tanusuke45) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kōnosuke_Uda) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/宇田鋼之介)

He graduated from the Animation Department of Tokyo Design Academy and worked as a freelancer at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). He currently works mainly for [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).

Currently affiliated with [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).
He is a professional screenwriter for anime, drama and theater and is a member of the Writers Guild of Japan.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/@tanusuke45) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kōnosuke_Uda) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/宇田鋼之介)

He graduated from the Animation Department of Tokyo Design Academy and worked as a freelancer at [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). He currently works mainly for [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).

Currently affiliated with [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1636957081701093377)

Ryouta Nakamura is a director affiliated with Toei Animation.

[Website](https://namieamuro.jp/index_pc.html) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/user/AmuroNamiech)

Namie Amuro is a retired Japanese pop artist. She is one of the best-selling artists ever in Japan with total sales of approximately 38,000,000 singles and albums. She has released 12 studio albums, 7 compilation albums and 47 singles, as of November 2018.

She initially debuted in 1992 as the lead singer of SUPER MONKEY'S, with fellow Okinawa Actors School classmates MAX as back dancers. After the group disbanded, she eventually had her solo debut in 1995 on the Avex Trax label with the Tetsuya Komuro produced single "Body Feels EXIT", which was an instant hit. The following singles "Chase the Chance", "Don't wanna cry" and "You're my sunshine" all sold 1 million copies during a short period of time. In 1996, Namie released her debut solo album "SWEET 19 BLUES" which sold 3.8 millions of copies throughout Japan and broke sales records at the time. It is the 12th most selling album of all time in Japan. At the end of 1996 she won the Grand Prix Award, the highest honor at the Japan Record Awards, for "Don't wanna cry". She is the youngest artist to have won the award. Then followed the release of the chart topping singles release "SWEET 19 BLUES (single)", "a walk in the park", "How to be a girl" and "CAN YOU CELEBRATE?". The latter became her best selling single and the 8th most selling single of all time in Japan.

__Favorite Animal:__ Big gentle dogs
__Favorite Mangaka:__ [Akira Toriyama](https://anilist.co/staff/96901/Akira-Toriyama)
__Favorite Music:__ '70s soul music
__Favorite Real-Life Pirate:__ Edward Teach (Blackbeard)
__Favorite Video Game:__ Puyo Puyo
__Trivia:__
- Oda is married to Chiaki Inaba, who had played Nami during Jump Festa One Piece stage performances.
- In a recent Japanese fan poll, Oda is currently ranked the 48th Most Popular Character in [One Piece](https://anilist.co/manga/30013/One-Piece/), despite the fact that he has never included himself in any issue of the manga (excluding SBS).
- He voiced the character ["Odacchi" (オダッチ)](https://anilist.co/character/12281/Eiichirou-Oda) in a [soccer-themed short](https://anilist.co/anime/2386/ONE-PIECE-Yume-no-Soccer-Ou/) that aired with the [3rd One Piece Movie](https://anilist.co/anime/461/One-Piece-Choppers-Kingdom-on-the-Island-of-Strange-Animals/). "Odacchi" is Oda's nickname, and he played soccer when he was younger.
- Oda is a fan of rapper Eminem, filmmaker Quentin Tarantino and [Tim Burton](https://anilist.co/staff/323667/Timothy-Walter-Burton).
- Oda's 3 favorite movies are Seven Samurai, The Nightmare Before Christmas, and Young Guns.
- According to Oda in an interview for US Shonen Jump, his favorite villain in One Piece is [Buggy the Clown](https://anilist.co/character/725/Buggy) (he joked that he literally threw him together).

Glauco Marques is a Brazilian voice actor.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/glauco_Marquess?s=20) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-MBsaTwi9QCEkqoN7ia6hw)
